question: Question_08_(a)
statement:
\textbf{Please note: Depending on the class section, the original exam
only featured Question 8 (a) OR Question 8 (b), not both.}

Find the line \emph{y = a + bx} which best fits the data points
\emph{(x, y)}: \emph{(0, 1)}, \emph{(1, 1)}, \emph{(1, 2)} in the least
squares sense.
